review: I got sucked into getting this..and I LOVE it!  It is very easy to use and it puts me one step closer to getting rid of my cable.  The Hulu app is a little wonky on my system, but I think that is more my online service than Fire. review: I love being able to access Amazon instant videos as well as other apps on this device.  I haven't had any problems streaming videos and the picture quality is crystal clear.  My only problem with it is that I haven't been able to use my Prime Music app on here, which is why I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5.  It might be something I'm doing wrong.  I would definitely recommend this to others.
